results.content: So far I am enjoying the course, and I have not experienced challenges with understanding. Everything is explained properly and it is very clear.

response.content: Hi Karabo, Glad to know you are enjoying the course and learning valuable skill from it. If you encounter any problem or didn't understand something, feel free to ask questions. I'll do my best to help you ASAP.

results.content:
I thought it was a good course overall. There were a few times that I got lost on a mac trying to connect to mysql since it is a bit different for me, i.e. ./mysql -u -p. Could not get postfix to work so finished that on my hosted site. Could not get smtp set up on either mac or windows following the instructions. Too many broken topics that are not covered well enough. And the content was ssllooooww. Played at 1.25 speed.

That said, I finished the course and now have a better grasp on PHP and working with the DOM in this syntax and I appreciate that Mr Nikam has shared his experience with the world to help spread knowledge.

Yes, I did check the postfix config... After spending an hour on both Win10 and Mac Mojave, I moved on because there were better ways for me to do the same. I did not ask any questions, correct. I have to move on because of time constraints that we all face.

I am updating my rating because I can tell that the instructor does care about his media for learning and students. He is very responsive and the problems I ran into may have been easily resolved by asking a question.

response.content:
Hi Chris,

Thank you for updating the rating. Yes! I always try my best to help every student ASAP. In your case, I would have helped you with all your queries. But I'm happy, you completed the course, learned from it and also figured out the issues on your own. We learn things better while fixing the problems on our own. You've completed the course, it doesn't mean you can't ask questions. You are always welcome to ask questions/doubts via Q&A section or private message.

I agree the course is not 100% perfect. That's why I communicate with students to learn what's missing or can be improved in the course. If you have topic suggestion or anything which you think can be covered better in the course, feel free to message me. I'll review, work on it and include in the next update.

Thanks again for completing the course & updating the rating, I appreciate.

Regards,
Pradnyankur :-)

results.content: The course is a good course on PHP for beginners. People need some awareness of Bootstrap and HTML, CSS. The course is a brilliant effort to teach PHP and MYSQL in one go to use databases and interact dynamically with websites formed.  If someone is looking to brush up skills in php and make dynamic websites with interaction with databases, this course is a must. Overall a good experience and worth the effort of going through the course.
